com.tozny.e3db

Class SearchRequestBuilder

  • Object
    • com.tozny.e3db.SearchRequestBuilder

  • public class SearchRequestBuilder
extends Object
    Used to specify parameters for a search operation.

    This class must be used to construct a SearchRequest instance that will subsequently be used in a call to Client.search(SearchRequest, ResultHandler)

    See the SearchRequest class for information about default values for each parameter.
